name: The Eyes of Texas
overview: The Eyes of Texas is a long-running regional television series which aired original episodes from 1969â€”1999. The program focused on unique people, events and places throughout the state of Texas. It was produced and syndicated by KPRC-TV & Stonefilms, both in Houston. The series won a number of awards and produced a number of travel guides for each region of the state, intertwining notable locations featured in the program with the usual tourist attractions.
